summary: This is an email correspondence dated July 14, 2019, attaching a draft search warrant application for Jeffrey Epstein's phone and iPad, which were seized on the day of his arrest. The email is sent for review and discussion.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the search warrant application; his phone and iPad were seized on the day of his arrest.

events.title: Draft Search Warrant Prepared
events.description: A draft search warrant application for Jeffrey Epstein's phone and iPad is prepared and sent for review via email.

events.title: Arrest of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested, and his phone and iPad were seized as part of the arrest.

keyFacts: A draft search warrant application was prepared for Jeffrey Epstein's phone and iPad on July 14, 2019.
The phone and iPad were seized from Epstein on the day of his arrest (July 6, 2019).
The document is an email correspondence attaching the draft warrant for review and discussion.
